Name: Sweet Hero
About the game: Control a coconut little kiss and slash your sweet enemies. Think before move! Sweet hero is a challenging grid-based movement game. Every enemy have your own pattern, use this in your favor. Some stages are difficult but you respawn fastly. Think of a strategy to win. Features 70 handcrafted stages. 4 worlds with different enemies on each. Relaxing soundtrack and satisfying sound effects. Fast paced combat Candy themed cute pixel art
